title: How to Make Lime Syrup

steps.headline: Pour the juice, sugar and water into a small, heavy-based saucepan.
Stir over medium heat.
steps.description: Do not bring to the boil just yet. Continue stirring until the sugar has completely dissolved.

steps.headline: Bring to the boil.
steps.description: Reduce to a simmer and allow to continue cooking for 1 minute.

steps.headline: Remove the syrup from the heat.
Allow to cool a little before serving as a warm sauce.
steps.description: Allow to cool completely before serving as a cold syrup.

text: Pour the juice, sugar and water into a small, heavy-based saucepan.  Stir over medium heat. Do not bring to the boil just yet. Continue stirring until the sugar has completely dissolved. Bring to the boil. Reduce to a simmer and allow to continue cooking for 1 minute. Remove the syrup from the heat.  Allow to cool a little before serving as a warm sauce. Allow to cool completely before serving as a cold syrup.
